overview: Greedy seductress Veronica Cole will stop at nothing to get her way, which includes shooting her business partner, Ethan Brady, just days before Christmas. Head accountant, and Ethan's ex-girlfriend, Brie Ellis, suspects shes up to no good, and with the help of Veronica's personal assistant, plots a sexy scheme in order to expose their corrupt boss. To what depths are they willing to go to dig up the truth, and at what cost will it come?
title: A Cold Night in December
